name: Don't be afraid of the dark (Lenan)
name_original: Don't be afraid of the dark (Lenan)
description:
A small horror game made for Ludum Dare 51

A “Horror” game where you control a character in a place where everything disappears after 10 seconds.

---- Development thoughts ----

Tools used:

  • Unity
  • Visual Studio
  • Audacity
  • Replica Studio (voices created through TTS)

Afterthought: Did i finished the game in time for compo? yes. Am i happy with the game i made? not really. It was my first time tackling the horror genre so i think i failed miserably. It’s not a good horror game and its not a good game overall. Usually my games have a great focus on different and unique mechanics, this game seems lazy when compared to most of my games, it has a basic mechanic and its focus on story didn’t help. Also i’m not good writer so it just made the game worse.

I also learned that unity HDRP can not be exported to web.
